metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3162 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The File module in Drupal 7.x before 7.43 and 8.x before 8.0.4 allowsremote authenticated users to bypass access restrictions and read, delete,or substitute a link to a file uploaded to an unprocessed form byleveraging permission to create content or comment and upload files.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
